description: Hide from print format if value is 0
label: Hide if zero
name: Sales Taxes and Charges-hide_if_zero

description: For example name of the accountant on a billing address, logistics admin on shipping, etc.
label: Contact Name
name: Address-contact_name

description: Stores date requested by customer to measure on-time delivery.
label: Benchmark Delivery Date
name: Sales Order Item-benchmark_delivery_date

description: Default Tax Template used to invoice Subscriptions or to create aggregated invoices.
label: Default Taxes and Charges Template
name: Customer Group-taxes_and_charges_template

description: If checked, is hidden from customer portal. This is used by customers to "delete" obsolete addresses, since disabling has unintended effects on open orders.
label: Portal Hide
name: Address-portal_hide

description: Extra qty consumed compared to BOM
label: Delta
name: Stock Entry Detail-delta

description: I would prefer a bool but this matches the existing field on Shipment
label: Pallets
name: Delivery Note-pallets

description: Default discount applied on the default list, is applied to each line item of QTN and SO.
label: Default Discount (%)
name: Customer-default_discount

label: Reason
name: Stock Entry-reason
options:
R&D
Stock Adjustment
Scrap
Service
Marketing

description: Total minutes to complete the work order
label: Total Time
name: Work Order-total_time

description:
Check if Serial No on Delivery Note matches that specified in Sales Order.
Only works for packed items.
label: Check Serial No on Delivery
name: Item-check_serial_no_on_delivery

description: Indicate who requested to change the ship date.
label: Date Change Origin
name: Sales Order-date_change_origin

description: Enables cartridge management in customer portal
label: Enable Cartridge Portal
name: Customer-enable_cartridge_portal

description: Can customer order refills for cartridges that are not stored at bNovate?
label: Allow Ordering Unstored Cartridges
name: Customer-allow_unstored_cartridges

label: Indicator Key
name: Sales Order-indicator_key
options:
Delivered | Deliverable now | WO started | Deliverable if WO / PO go through as planned | Non-Deliverable action needed | Not a stock item.

Deliverability status and projected stock include draft SOs.

description: If checked, bNovate organises the return shipping and import of cartridges for refills.
label: Organize Return
name: Customer-organize_return

description: If set, users at this customer can only use this billing address.
label: Portal Billing Address
name: Customer-portal_billing_address

description: Users from this company can submit service reports.
label: Is Service Partner
name: Customer-is_service_partner
